CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 11, 1962, pg. 16 reads: "International Garden Party - A somewhat international flavor found its way into the beautiful garden party on the lawn of Wesley Center AME Zion Church, on July 29. Left to right, front: Mmes. Esther McClung, Bertha Robinson, Lucinda Harper and Madeline Foggie, wife of the pastor, and Dr. Charles J. Foggie.  Back row: Shirline Westray, Mrs. Frances Lanier (Mexico), Mrs. Gladys Davidson (Puerto Rico) and Sara Burney. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left, front row: Esther McClung, Bertha Robinson, Lucinda Harper, and Madeline Foggie; back row: Shirline Westray, Frances Lanier, Gladys Davidson, and Sara Burney, with Charlene Foggie on far left, posed in Wesley Center AME Zion Church for international garden party
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Trophies--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Harper, Lucinda.Foggie, Madeline Sharpe.Wesley Center African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Foggie, Charlene.
